SELECT t.*, t1.sample_design_pic, t1.color_name, t1.color_specification, t1.sales_type, t1.is_trim, t1.manufacturer, t1.manufacturer_no, t1.manufacturer_color,
t2.style_name, t2.design_no, t2.category_name, t2.prod_category1st, t2.prod_category, t2.prod_category2nd, t2.prod_category3rd, t2.brand, t2.band_code, t2.year, t2.season, t2.month, t2.sex, t2.devt_type, t2.main_materials, t2.rd_mat, t2.designer, t2.designer_id FROM t_sample_style_group t LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_color t1 ON t.style_no = t1.style_no LEFT JOIN t_sample_design t2 on t1.design_no = t2.design_no WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0'
and t.group_code like "%"#{groupCode}"%"
and t.group_name like "%"#{groupName}"%"
and t.style_no like "%"#{styleNo}"%"
and t.remarks like "%"#{remarks}"%"

SELECT t.id, t.company_code, t.create_name, t.create_date, t.update_name, t.update_date, t0.group_code, t0.group_name, t.style_no, t1.sample_design_pic, t1.color_name,
t1.color_specification, t1.sales_type, t1.is_trim, t1.manufacturer, t1.manufacturer_no, t1.manufacturer_color,
t2.style_name, t2.design_no, t2.category_name, t2.prod_category1st, t2.prod_category, t2.prod_category2nd, t2.prod_category3rd, t2.brand, t2.band_code, t2.year, t2.season, t2.month, t2.sex, t2.devt_type, t2.main_materials, t2.rd_mat, t2.designer, t2.designer_id
FROM t_sample_style_group_color t LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_group t0 ON t.group_code = t0.group_code LEFT JOIN t_sample_style_color t1 ON t.style_no = t1.style_no LEFT JOIN t_sample_design t2 on t1.design_no = t2.design_no WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.group_code = #{groupCode}
